alert.note: Alert for Gila Bend; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 28 at 2:03AM MST until March 29 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Gila Bend, West Pinal County and Sonoran Desert National Monument. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Gila Bend; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; West Pinal County
